title: Don’t Expect Nintendo Switch 2 Before April 2025 - Kinda Funny Games Daily 08.14.24
description:
Go to KindaFunny.com/MonsterHunterNow to play right now!

Nintendo Switch 2 might not arrive before April, Dragon Age: The Veilguard gets its release date tomorrow, and Valve’s unannounced hero shooter.

Today after, KFGD, you’ll get:
 - GAMESCAST is our Visions of Mana preview
 - The STREAM is us playing Splitgate 2!
If you’re a Kinda Funny Member:
 - You can get today’s Gregway being done by Roger

Time Stamps:
00:00:00 - Start
00:08:59 - Housekeeping
               -  The Roper Report   -
00:10:08 - Developers reportedly told not to expect Switch 2 to launch before April 2025
00:30:51 - Bioware is revealing the Dragon Age: The Veilguard release date tomorrow
00:40:50 - SuperChats
00:46:24 - Valve’s unannounced hero shooter is already one of Steam’s most-played games
00:53:18 - Valve Confirms It Will Add SteamOS Support to Asus ROG Ally
00:55:38 - Fallout: New Vegas director says he would lead a new Fallout game if granted creative freedom
00:58:27 - Let’s Build a Zoo studio announces MMORPG dev sim Let’s Build a Dungeon
01:00:30 - Wee News!
01:00:14 - You‘re Wrong
